calculations.name: Tenor Vega
calculations.tableau_expression:
if year([RISK_DATE]) = 1980 then "Parallel" else 


    IF [Risk Date # of Days]<=30 then "1M"
    //else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=183 then "3-6M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=61 then "2M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=91 then "3M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=182 then "6M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=365 then "1Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=730 then "2Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=1095 then "3Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=1461 then "4Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=1826 then "5Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=2557 then "7Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=3652 then "10Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=5479 then "15Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=7306 then "20Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]>7306 then ">20Y"
     
else "Error"


END
end
END
END
END
END
END
END
end
end
END
END
END
END
END
